section.title:
Table:
constructionpoint
section.para: construction points are artificials points to build objects.

section.title:
Table:
dimension
section.para: dimension arcs displays measures done on the field. For example: distances to buildings corner

section.title:
Table:
distributor
section.para: Companies and distributors list.

section.title:
Table:
district
section.para: Districts.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing hydrant via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
hydrant
section.para: hydrant.

section.title:
Table:
hydrant_provider
section.para: hydrant providers list.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing hydrant via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
hydrant_type
section.para: type for hydrant.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing hydrant via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
View:
hydrant_view
section.para: View for hydrant. This view is editable (a rule exists to forwad changes to the table).

figure.title: Definition of view hydrant_view
figure.programlisting: SELECT hydrant.id , hydrant.identification , hydrant.id_type , hydrant.id_distributor , hydrant.id_status , hydrant.id_provider , hydrant.year , hydrant.model , hydrant.altitude_real , hydrant.remarks , hydrant.id_node , hydrant.id_district , hydrant.id_pressurezone , hydrant.id_printmap , hydrant._printmaps , hydrant._districts , hydrant.geometry , hydrant_type.name AS _type , distributor.name AS _distributor , status.name AS _status_name , status.active AS _status_active , hydrant_provider.name AS _provider , node.altitude_dtm AS _altitude_dtm , district.name AS _district , district.shortname AS _district_shortname , pressurezone.name AS _pressurezone , pressurezone.shortname AS _pressurezone_shortname , pressurezone.colorcode AS _pressurezone_colorcode FROM ( ( ( ( ( ( (distribution.hydrant JOIN distribution.hydrant_type ON ( (hydrant.id_type = hydrant_type.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.distributor ON ( (hydrant.id_distributor = distributor.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.status ON ( (hydrant.id_status = status.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.hydrant_provider ON ( (hydrant.id_provider = hydrant_provider.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.node ON ( (hydrant.id_node = node.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.district ON ( (hydrant.id_district = district.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.pressurezone ON ( (hydrant.id_pressurezone = pressurezone.id) ) );

Table:
installation
section.para: installation.

Tables referencing installation_pump via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing installation_source via Foreign Key Constraints
Tables referencing installation_source via Foreign Key Constraints

Table:
installation_tank

section.title:
Table:
installation_treatment
section.para: storage treatments. These are related to installations and are made of cisterns

section.title:
Table:
installation_type
section.para: type for installation.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing installation via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view installation_view
figure.programlisting: SELECT installation.id , installation.name , installation.identification , installation.id_status , installation.id_distributor , installation.remarks , installation.links , installation.year , installation.altitude_real , installation.open_water_surface , installation.parcel , installation.eca , installation.id_node , installation.id_district , installation.id_pressurezone , installation.id_printmap , installation._printmaps , installation._districts , installation._schema_view , installation.geometry , installation_type.name AS _type , installation_type.shortname AS _type_shortname , status.name AS _status , status.active AS _status_active , distributor.name AS _distributor , node.altitude_dtm AS _altitude_dtm , district.name AS _district , pressurezone.name AS _pressurezone , pressurezone.shortname AS _pressurezone_shortname , pressurezone.colorcode AS _pressurezone_colorcode FROM ( ( ( ( ( (distribution.installation JOIN distribution.installation_type ON ( (installation.id_type = installation_type.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.status ON ( (installation.id_status = status.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.distributor ON ( (installation.id_distributor = distributor.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.node ON ( (installation.id_node = node.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.district ON ( (installation.id_district = district.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.pressurezone ON ( (installation.id_pressurezone = pressurezone.id) ) );

section.title:
Table:
labelview
section.para: Table for editing label view mode.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing pipe via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
leak
section.para: pipe leaks

section.title:
Table:
leak_cause
section.para: Causes of leak

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing leak via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
leak_damage
section.para: Damages to leak

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing leak via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
leak_type
section.para: Types of leak

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing leak via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view leak_view
figure.programlisting: SELECT leak_type.name AS type , leak_cause.name AS cause , leak_damage.name AS damage , leak.detection_date , leak.repair_date , leak._repaired , leak.address , leak.pipe_replaced , leak.description , leak.repair , leak.geometry FROM ( ( (distribution.leak JOIN distribution.leak_type ON ( (leak.id_type = leak_type.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.leak_cause ON ( (leak.id_cause = leak_cause.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.leak_damage ON ( (leak.id_damage = leak_damage.id) ) );

section.title:
Table:
logged_actions
section.para: History of auditable actions on audited tables, from distribution.if_modified_func()

listitem.para: Unique identifier for each auditable event
Database schema audited table for this event is in
Non-schema-qualified table name of table event occured in
Table OID. Changes with drop/create. Get with 'tablename'::regclass
Login / session user whose statement caused the audited event
Transaction start timestamp for tx in which audited event occurred
Statement start timestamp for tx in which audited event occurred
Wall clock time at which audited event's trigger call occurred
Identifier of transaction that made the change. May wrap, but unique paired with action_tstamp_tx.
Application name set when this audit event occurred. Can be changed in-session by client.
IP address of client that issued query. Null for unix domain socket.
Remote peer IP port address of client that issued query. Undefined for unix socket.
Top-level query that caused this auditable event. May be more than one statement.
Action type; I = insert, D = delete, U = update, T = truncate
Record value. Null for statement-level trigger. For INSERT this is the new tuple. For DELETE and UPDATE it is the old tuple.
New values of fields changed by UPDATE. Null except for row-level UPDATE events.
't' if audit event is from an FOR EACH STATEMENT trigger, 'f' for FOR EACH ROW

section.title:
Table:
node
section.para: Nodes. Type:If three pipe or more arrives at the node: three. If one pipe: one. If two: depends on characteristics of pipe: two_same (everything same), two_year (year is different), two_material (and year is/are different), two_diameter (and material/year are different). Orientation is calculated if two pipe arrives to place the symbol in theright direction.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing hydrant via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view node_control
figure.programlisting: ( ( ( SELECT'Node with undefined type'::text AS problem , node.id ,'node id'::text AS comment FROM distribution.node WHERE (node._type IS NULL) UNIONSELECT'Node with no pipe/valve connected'::text AS problem , node.id ,'node id'::text AS comment FROM distribution.node WHERE ( (NOT (node.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT pipe.id_node_a FROM distribution.pipe ) ) ) AND (NOT (node.id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT pipe.id_node_b FROM distribution.pipe ) ) ) ) ) UNIONSELECT'Too close node'::text AS problem , a.id , ( ( ( ( ('Distance: '::text || (st_distance (a.geometry , b.geometry ) )::numeric (6 ,4 ) ) || 'Position: '::text ) || st_x (a.geometry) ) || ' '::text ) || st_y (a.geometry) ) AS comment FROM distribution.node a , distribution.node b WHERE ( (a.id <> b.id) AND st_dwithin (a.geometry , b.geometry , (0.004)::double precision ) ) ) UNIONSELECT'Pipes without node(s)'::text AS problem , pipe.id ,'pipe id'::text AS comment FROM distribution.pipe WHERE ( (pipe.id_node_a IS NULL) OR (pipe.id_node_b IS NULL) ) ) UNION SELECT'Non up-to-date altitudes'::text AS problem , (count (node.id) ) ::integer AS id , 'number of node'::text AS comment FROM distribution.node WHERE (node.altitude_dtm IS NULL) ORDER BY 1;

section.title:
Table:
pipe
section.para: Table for pipe. This should not be used for editing/viewing, as a more complete view (pipe_view) exists.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing leak via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view pipe_child_parent
figure.programlisting: SELECT foo2.child , foo2.parent , (st_curvetoline (st_geomfromewkt ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( 'SRID=21781;CIRCULARSTRING('::text || st_x (foo2.start_point) ) || ' '::text ) || st_y (foo2.start_point) ) || ','::text ) || (st_x (foo2.middle_point) + (foo2.distance * cos (foo2.azimuth) ) ) ) || ' '::text ) || (st_y (foo2.middle_point) + (foo2.distance * sin (foo2.azimuth) ) ) ) || ','::text ) || st_x (foo2.end_point) ) || ' '::text ) || st_y (foo2.end_point) ) || ')'::text ) ) , 15 ) )::geometry (LineString ,21781 ) AS geometry FROM ( SELECT foo.child , foo.parent , foo.start_point , foo.end_point , ( (pi () / (2)::double precision ) + st_azimuth (foo.start_point , foo.end_point ) ) AS azimuth , ( (0.5)::double precision * st_distance (foo.start_point , foo.end_point ) ) AS distance , (st_line_interpolate_point (st_makeline (foo.start_point , foo.end_point ) , (0.5)::double precision ) )::geometry (Point ,21781 ) AS middle_point FROM ( SELECT a.id AS child , b.id AS parent , (st_line_interpolate_point (a.geometry , (0.5)::double precision ) )::geometry (Point ,21781 ) AS start_point , st_closestpoint (st_makeline ( (st_line_interpolate_point (b.geometry , (LEAST ( (1)::numeric , ( ( (4)::numeric / b._length2d ) / (2)::numeric ) ) )::double precision ) )::geometry (Point ,21781 ) , (st_line_interpolate_point (b.geometry , (GREATEST ( (0)::numeric , ( (1)::numeric - ( ( (4)::numeric / b._length2d ) / (2)::numeric ) ) ) )::double precision ) )::geometry (Point ,21781 ) ) , a.geometry ) AS end_point FROM (distribution.pipe a JOIN distribution.pipe b ON ( (a.id_parent = b.id) ) ) WHERE (a.id_parent IS NOT NULL) ) foo ) foo2;

section.title:
Table:
pipe_function
section.para: Function for pipe. Here is determined if pipe should be visible or not in the schematic view, but this can be overidden by the pipe attribute schema_force_view.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing pipe via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
pipe_install_method
section.para: Installation methods.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing pipe via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
pipe_material
section.para: List of materials for pipe. All the possible combinations material/diameter are listed in this table. _fancy_name is automatically generated by rules on insert and update. It is meant to be used in QGIS for the combo box of pipe.id_material

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing pipe via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
pipe_protection
section.para: Pipes prtoection details.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing pipe via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
View:
pipe_schema
section.para: Final view for schema

figure.title: Definition of view pipe_schema
figure.programlisting: SELECT pipe.id , pipe.id_function , pipe.id_install_method , pipe.id_material , pipe.id_distributor , pipe.id_precision , pipe.id_protection , pipe.id_status , pipe.id_pressurezone , pipe.labelview , pipe.labelview_schema , pipe.year , pipe.pressure_nominal , pipe.folder , pipe.remarks , pipe.id_printmap , pipe._printmaps , pipe.id_district , pipe._districts , pipe_schema_merged._length2d , pipe_schema_merged._length3d , pipe_schema_merged.number_of_pipe , pipe_schema_merged.tunnel_or_bridge , pipe_schema_merged._valve_count , pipe_schema_merged._valve_closed , pipe_schema_merged.geometry FROM (distribution.pipe_schema_merged JOIN distribution.pipe ON ( (pipe.id = pipe_schema_merged.id) ) );

section.title:
View:
pipe_schema_error
section.para: Report IDs of parent pipe where pipe concatenation leads to a MultiLineString and not to a LineString.

figure.title: Definition of view pipe_schema_error
Definition of view pipe_schema_items
figure.programlisting: SELECT pipe_schema_viewableitems.geometry , distribution.get_parent (pipe_schema_viewableitems.id , pipe_schema_viewableitems.id_parent ) AS groupid , pipe_schema_viewableitems._length2d , pipe_schema_viewableitems._length3d , pipe_schema_viewableitems.tunnel_or_bridge , pipe_schema_viewableitems._valve_count , pipe_schema_viewableitems._valve_closed FROM distribution.pipe_schema_viewableitems;

section.title:
View:
pipe_schema_merged
section.para: Merging of pipe based on the group ID

figure.title: Definition of view pipe_schema_merged
figure.programlisting: SELECT pipe_schema_items.groupid AS id , (st_linemerge (st_union (pipe_schema_items.geometry) ) )::geometry (LineString ,21781 ) AS geometry , count (pipe_schema_items.groupid) AS number_of_pipe , sum (pipe_schema_items._length2d) AS _length2d , sum (pipe_schema_items._length3d) AS _length3d , bool_or (pipe_schema_items.tunnel_or_bridge) AS tunnel_or_bridge , sum (pipe_schema_items._valve_count) AS _valve_count , bool_or (pipe_schema_items._valve_closed) AS _valve_closed FROM distribution.pipe_schema_items GROUP BY pipe_schema_items.groupid;

section.title:
View:
pipe_schema_node
section.para: Final view for schema completed with node.

figure.title: Definition of view pipe_schema_node
figure.programlisting: SELECT foo.id , foo.id_function , foo.id_install_method , foo.id_material , foo.id_distributor , foo.id_precision , foo.id_protection , foo.id_status , foo.id_pressurezone , foo.labelview , foo.labelview_schema , foo.year , foo.pressure_nominal , foo.folder , foo.remarks , foo.id_printmap , foo._printmaps , foo.id_district , foo._districts , foo._length2d , foo._length3d , foo.number_of_pipe , foo.tunnel_or_bridge , foo._valve_count , foo._valve_closed , foo.geometry , foo.id_node_a , foo.id_node_b , CASE WHEN (foo.tunnel_or_bridge IS TRUE) THEN NULL::numeric ELSE abs ( (node_a.altitude_dtm - node_b.altitude_dtm) ) END AS _diff_elevation , CASE WHEN (foo.tunnel_or_bridge IS TRUE) THEN NULL::numeric ELSE (abs ( (node_a.altitude_dtm - node_b.altitude_dtm) ) / foo._length3d ) END AS _slope FROM ( ( ( SELECT pipe_schema.id , pipe_schema.id_function , pipe_schema.id_install_method , pipe_schema.id_material , pipe_schema.id_distributor , pipe_schema.id_precision , pipe_schema.id_protection , pipe_schema.id_status , pipe_schema.id_pressurezone , pipe_schema.labelview , pipe_schema.labelview_schema , pipe_schema.year , pipe_schema.pressure_nominal , pipe_schema.folder , pipe_schema.remarks , pipe_schema.id_printmap , pipe_schema._printmaps , pipe_schema.id_district , pipe_schema._districts , pipe_schema._length2d , pipe_schema._length3d , pipe_schema.number_of_pipe , pipe_schema.tunnel_or_bridge , pipe_schema._valve_count , pipe_schema._valve_closed , pipe_schema.geometry , distribution.node_get_id (st_startpoint (pipe_schema.geometry) , true ) AS id_node_a , distribution.node_get_id (st_endpoint (pipe_schema.geometry) , true ) AS id_node_b FROM distribution.pipe_schema ) foo LEFT JOIN distribution.node node_a ON ( (foo.id_node_a = node_a.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.node node_b ON ( (foo.id_node_b = node_b.id) ) );

section.title:
View:
pipe_schema_viewableitems
section.para: viewable pipe in the schematic view (before merge)

figure.title: Definition of view pipe_schema_viewableitems
figure.programlisting: SELECT pipe.id , pipe.id_parent , pipe._length2d , pipe._length3d , pipe.tunnel_or_bridge , pipe.geometry_schematic AS geometry , pipe._valve_count , pipe._valve_closed FROM (distribution.pipe JOIN distribution.status ON ( (pipe.id_status = status.id) ) ) WHERE ( (pipe._schema_view IS TRUE) AND (status.active IS TRUE) );

section.title:
View:
pipe_view
section.para: View for pipe. This view is not editable

figure.title: Definition of view pipe_view
figure.programlisting: SELECT pipe.id , pipe.id_parent , pipe.id_function , pipe.id_install_method , pipe.id_material , pipe.id_distributor , pipe.id_precision , pipe.id_protection , pipe.id_status , pipe.schema_force_view , pipe.year , pipe.tunnel_or_bridge , pipe.pressure_nominal , pipe.folder , pipe.remarks , pipe._valve_count , pipe._valve_closed , pipe._schema_view , pipe.id_node_a , pipe.id_node_b , pipe.id_district , pipe.id_pressurezone , pipe.id_printmap , pipe._length2d , pipe._length3d , pipe._diff_elevation , pipe._printmaps , pipe._districts , pipe.geometry , pipe_function.name AS _function_name , pipe_function.code_sire AS _function_code_sire , pipe_install_method.name AS _install_method , pipe_material._fancyname AS _material_name , pipe_material.name AS _material_longname , pipe_material.diameter AS _material_diameter , pipe_material.diameter_internal AS _material_diameter_internal , pipe_material.code_sire AS _material_code_sire , distributor.name AS _distributor ,"precision".name AS _precision , pipe_protection.name AS _protection , status.name AS _status_name , status.active AS _status_active , pressurezone.name AS _pressurezone , pressurezone.shortname AS _pressurezone_shortname , pressurezone.colorcode AS _pressurezone_colorcode FROM ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( ( (distribution.pipe JOIN distribution.pipe_function ON ( (pipe.id_function = pipe_function.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.pipe_install_method ON ( (pipe.id_install_method = pipe_install_method.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.pipe_material ON ( (pipe.id_material = pipe_material.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.distributor ON ( (pipe.id_distributor = distributor.id) ) ) JOIN distribution."precision" ON ( (pipe.id_precision = "precision".id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.pipe_protection ON ( (pipe.id_protection = pipe_protection.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.status ON ( (pipe.id_status = status.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.pressurezone ON ( (pipe.id_pressurezone = pressurezone.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.node node_a ON ( (pipe.id_node_a = node_a.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.node node_b ON ( (pipe.id_node_b = node_b.id) ) );

section.title:
Table:
precision
section.para: pressure "precision".

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing pipe via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
pressurezone
section.para: Pressure zones.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing hydrant via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view pressurezone_child_parent

section.title:
Table:
printmap
section.para: This table is used for polygons for predefined printable maps. shortname would be used as label string, and long_mame would be used in the print composer.

section.title:
Table:
protectionzone
section.para: protectionzones.

section.title:
Table:
protectionzone_type
section.para: type for hydrant.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing protectionzone via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
View:
protectionzone_view
section.para: View for protectionzone. This view is editable (a rule exists to forward changes to the table).

figure.title: Definition of view protectionzone_view
figure.programlisting: SELECT protectionzone.id , protectionzone.id_type , protectionzone.name , protectionzone.validated , protectionzone.date , protectionzone.agent , protectionzone.geometry , protectionzone_type.shortname AS _type , protectionzone_type.name AS _type_long FROM (distribution.protectionzone JOIN distribution.protectionzone_type ON ( (protectionzone.id_type = protectionzone_type.id) ) );

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing installation via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
View:
samplingpoint_view
section.para: View for samplingpoint. This view is editable (a rule exists to forwad changes to the table).

figure.title: Definition of view samplingpoint_view
figure.programlisting: SELECT samplingpoint.id , samplingpoint.identification , samplingpoint.id_district , samplingpoint.id_printmap , samplingpoint.id_pressurezone , samplingpoint._printmaps , samplingpoint._districts , samplingpoint.remarks , samplingpoint.geometry , district.name AS _district , pressurezone.name AS _pressurezone , pressurezone.shortname AS _pressurezone_shortname , pressurezone.colorcode AS _pressurezone_colorcode FROM ( (distribution.samplingpoint LEFT JOIN distribution.district ON ( (samplingpoint.id_district = district.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.pressurezone ON ( (samplingpoint.id_pressurezone = pressurezone.id) ) );

figure.title: Definition of view search_view
figure.programlisting: ( ( SELECT'Ouvrage'::text AS layer_name , ( ( (installation_view._type)::text || ' '::text ) || (installation_view.name)::text ) AS search_text , installation_view.geometry FROM distribution.installation_view WHERE (installation_view._status_active IS TRUE) UNIONSELECT'Hydrantes'::text AS layer_name , ( ( (hydrant_view._district)::text || ' '::text ) || (hydrant_view.identification)::text ) AS search_text , hydrant_view.geometry FROM distribution.hydrant_view WHERE (hydrant_view._status_active IS TRUE) ) UNIONSELECT'Abonns'::text AS layer_name , ( ( (subscriber_view._type)::text || ' '::text ) || (subscriber_view._client_identification_full)::text ) AS search_text , subscriber_view.geometry FROM distribution.subscriber_view ) UNIONSELECT'Vannes'::text AS layer_name , ( ( (valve_view._function)::text || ' '::text ) || valve_view.identification ) AS search_text , valve_view.geometry FROM distribution.valve_view WHERE (valve_view.identification IS NOT NULL);

section.title:
Table:
status
section.para: Status table, with SIRE id.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing hydrant via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
subscriber
section.para: Table for subscriber. This should not be used for editing/viewing, as a more complete view (subscriber_view) exists.

figure.title: Definition of view subscriber_pipe_relation

section.title:
Table:
subscriber_type
section.para: type for subscriber.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing subscriber via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
View:
subscriber_view
section.para: View for subscriber. This view is editable (a rule exists to forward changes to the table).

figure.title: Definition of view subscriber_view
figure.programlisting: SELECT subscriber.id , subscriber.id_type , subscriber.id_pipe , subscriber.client_identification , subscriber._client_identification_full , subscriber.parcel , subscriber.id_district , subscriber.id_pressurezone , subscriber.id_printmap , subscriber._printmaps , subscriber._districts , subscriber.geometry , subscriber_type.name AS _type , district.name AS _district , pressurezone.name AS _pressurezone , pressurezone.shortname AS _pressurezone_shortname , pressurezone.colorcode AS _pressurezone_colorcode FROM ( ( (distribution.subscriber JOIN distribution.subscriber_type ON ( (subscriber.id_type = subscriber_type.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.district ON ( (subscriber.id_district = district.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.pressurezone ON ( (subscriber.id_pressurezone = pressurezone.id) ) );

section.title:
Table:
valve
section.para: Table for valve.

section.title:
Table:
valve_function
section.para: Types of valve

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing valve via Foreign Key Constraints

section.title:
Table:
valve_maintenance
section.para: valve_maintenance table.

figure.title: Definition of view valve_schema
figure.programlisting: SELECT valve.id , valve.identification , valve.id_type , valve.id_function , valve.id_pipe , valve.id_maintenance , valve.diameter_nominal , valve.year , valve.closed , valve.altitude_real , valve.remarks , valve.schema_force_view , valve.id_node , valve.id_district , valve.id_pressurezone , valve._districts , valve._printmaps , valve.geometry_schematic AS geometry , valve_function.name AS _function , valve_function.shortname AS _function_shortname , valve_type.type AS _type , CASE WHEN (valve_function.shortname IS NULL) THEN ( (valve.identification)::character varying )::text ELSE ( (valve_function.shortname)::text || ( (valve.identification)::character varying )::text ) END AS _label , node.altitude_dtm AS _altitude_dtm , district.name AS _district , pressurezone.name AS _pressurezone , pressurezone.shortname AS _pressurezone_shortname , pressurezone.colorcode AS _pressurezone_colorcode FROM ( ( ( ( (distribution.valve JOIN distribution.valve_type ON ( (valve.id_function = valve_type.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.valve_function ON ( (valve.id_function = valve_function.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.node ON ( (valve.id_node = node.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.district ON ( (valve.id_district = district.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.pressurezone ON ( (valve.id_pressurezone = pressurezone.id) ) ) WHERE (valve._schema_view IS TRUE);

section.title:
Table:
valve_type
section.para: Types of valve

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing valve via Foreign Key Constraints

figure.title: Definition of view valve_view
figure.programlisting: SELECT valve.id , valve.identification , valve.id_type , valve.id_function , valve.id_maintenance , valve.id_pipe , valve.diameter_nominal , valve.year , valve.closed , valve.altitude_real , valve.remarks , valve.schema_force_view , valve.id_node , valve.id_district , valve.id_pressurezone , valve.id_printmap , valve._printmaps , valve._districts , valve._schema_view , valve.geometry , valve_function.name AS _function , valve_function.shortname AS _function_shortname , valve_type.type AS _type , CASE WHEN (valve_function.shortname IS NULL) THEN ( (valve.identification)::character varying )::text ELSE ( (valve_function.shortname)::text || ( (valve.identification)::character varying )::text ) END AS _label , node.altitude_dtm AS _altitude_dtm , district.name AS _district , pressurezone.name AS _pressurezone , pressurezone.shortname AS _pressurezone_shortname , pressurezone.colorcode AS _pressurezone_colorcode FROM ( ( ( ( (distribution.valve JOIN distribution.valve_type ON ( (valve.id_type = valve_type.id) ) ) JOIN distribution.valve_function ON ( (valve.id_function = valve_function.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.node ON ( (valve.id_node = node.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.district ON ( (valve.id_district = district.id) ) ) LEFT JOIN distribution.pressurezone ON ( (valve.id_pressurezone = pressurezone.id) ) );

section.title:
Table:
visible
section.para: Table for editing in qgis tri state boolean (NULL/True/False) by using value relation.

itemizedlist.title: Tables referencing installation via Foreign Key Constraints

section.xreflabel: distributionaudit_table(audit_query_text regclass, audit_rows boolean, target_table boolean)
section.title: audit_table(audit_query_text regclass, audit_rows boolean, target_table boolean)
section.titleabbrev: audit_table(audit_query_text regclass, audit_rows boolean, target_table boolean)

section.title: dimension_distance()
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL trigger
Fcn/Trigger: updates the distance between the two extremities of the arc.
BEGIN UPDATE distribution.dimension SET distance_extremities = ST_Distance( ST_StartPoint(NEW.geometry), ST_EndPoint(NEW.geometry) ) WHERE id = NEW.id; RETURN NEW; END;

section.title: get_district_id(public.geometry)
get_districts(public.geometry)
get_parent(integer, integer)
get_pressurezone_id(public.geometry)
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL integer
Returns the id of the first overlapping pressurezone.
DECLARE geom ALIAS FOR $1; id_pressurezone integer; BEGIN SELECT pressurezone.id INTO id_pressurezone FROM distribution.pressurezone WHERE ST_Intersects(geom,pressurezone.geometry) IS TRUE ORDER BY ST_Length(ST_Intersection(geom,pressurezone.geometry)) DESC LIMIT 1; RETURN id_pressurezone; END

section.title: get_printmap_id(public.geometry)
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL integer[]
Returns the id of the first overlapping printmap.
DECLARE geom ALIAS FOR $1; BEGIN RETURN ARRAY( SELECT printmap.id FROM distribution.printmap WHERE ST_Intersects(geom,printmap.geometry) IS TRUE); END;

section.title: get_printmaps(public.geometry)

para.programlisting:
BEGIN UPDATE distribution.hydrant SET id_node = distribution.node_get_id(NEW.geometry,true),
id_district = distribution.get_district_id(NEW.geometry),
id_pressurezone = distribution.get_pressurezone_id(NEW.geometry), id_printmap = distribution.get_printmap_id(NEW.geometry), geometry_schematic = NEW.geometry,
_printmaps = distribution.get_printmaps(NEW.geometry), _districts = distribution.get_districts(NEW.geometry) WHERE id = NEW.id ; RETURN NEW; END;

section.title: if_modified_func()

para.programlisting:
BEGIN UPDATE distribution.installation SET id_node = distribution.node_get_id(NEW.geometry,true),
id_district = distribution.get_district_id(NEW.geometry),
id_pressurezone = distribution.get_pressurezone_id(NEW.geometry), id_printmap = distribution.get_printmap_id(NEW.geometry), geometry_schematic = NEW.geometry,
_printmaps = distribution.get_printmaps(NEW.geometry), _districts = distribution.get_districts(NEW.geometry) WHERE id = NEW.id ; RETURN NEW; END;

section.title: leak_repaired()
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL trigger
Fcn/Trigger: updates the repaired status of the leak.
BEGIN UPDATE distribution.leak SET _repaired = CASE WHEN repair_date IS NULL THEN false ELSE true END WHERE id = NEW.id; RETURN NEW; END;

section.xreflabel: distributionlitres_per_cm(dim2 integer, dim1 double precision, id_type double precision)
section.title: litres_per_cm(dim2 integer, dim1 double precision, id_type double precision)
section.titleabbrev: litres_per_cm(dim2 integer, dim1 double precision, id_type double precision)
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL double precision
Calculate the litres_per_cm of a tank cistern.
BEGIN IF id_type = 1 THEN return pi()*(dim1/2)^2*10; ELSEIF id_type = 2 THEN return dim2*dim2*10; ELSE return NULL; END IF; END

section.title: node_altitude()
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL void
Fill the altitude of the node.
BEGIN UPDATE distribution.node SET altitude_dtm = altitude.altitude(geometry) WHERE altitude_dtm IS NULL ; END;

section.title: node_geom()
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL trigger
Fcn/Trigger: set uptodate to false for altitude when geometry changes.
BEGIN UPDATE distribution.node SET altitude_dtm = NULL WHERE id = NEW.id ; RETURN NEW; END;

section.title: node_get_id(public.geometry, boolean)
node_set_type()
node_type(node_id integer)
pipe_count_valve(integer)

para.programlisting: BEGIN UPDATE distribution.pipe SET id_node_a = distribution.node_get_id(ST_StartPoint(NEW.geometry),true), id_node_b = distribution.node_get_id(ST_EndPoint( NEW.geometry),true), id_district = distribution.get_district_id(NEW.geometry), id_pressurezone = distribution.get_pressurezone_id(NEW.geometry), id_printmap = distribution.get_printmap_id(NEW.geometry), geometry_schematic = NEW.geometry, _printmaps = distribution.get_printmaps(NEW.geometry), _districts = distribution.get_districts(NEW.geometry), _length2d = ST_Length(NEW.geometry), _length3d = NULL, _diff_elevation = NULL WHERE id = NEW.id ; RETURN NEW; END;

section.title: pipe_get_id(public.geometry)
pipe_length3d()
pipe_material_fancy_name()
printmap_geom()
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL trigger
Fcn/Trigger: updates the size of the bounding box into width/length fields.
BEGIN UPDATE distribution.printmap SET _east = ST_XMax(BOX2D(NEW.geometry))-ST_XMin(BOX2D(NEW.geometry)), _north = ST_YMax(BOX2D(NEW.geometry))-ST_YMin(BOX2D(NEW.geometry)) WHERE id = NEW.id ; RETURN NEW; END;

section.title: subscriber_fullid()
table_fields(exclude character varying, character varying[])
section.para:
Function Properties
Language Return Type
PLPGSQL text
Returns field names from a table.
DECLARE ftable ALIAS FOR $1; result text; BEGIN SELECT string_agg(pg_attribute.attname , '', '') INTO result FROM pg_class, pg_attribute WHERE pg_class.relname = ftable AND pg_class.oid = pg_attribute.attrelid AND pg_attribute.attnum > 0 AND pg_attribute.attname != all(exclude) ; RETURN result; END

para.programlisting:
BEGIN UPDATE distribution.valve SET id_district = distribution.get_district_id(NEW.geometry),
id_pressurezone = distribution.get_pressurezone_id(NEW.geometry), id_printmap = distribution.get_printmap_id(NEW.geometry), id_pipe = distribution.pipe_get_id(NEW.geometry),
geometry_schematic = NEW.geometry,
_printmaps = distribution.get_printmaps(NEW.geometry), _districts = distribution.get_districts(NEW.geometry) WHERE id = NEW.id ; RETURN NEW; END;
